name: Corba IDL Test Suite
short_description: A comprehensive CORBA IDL test suite. Used to test any CORBA IDL compiler that  is compliant with at least the CORBA 2.3 specification. Includes scripts to run the tests with OpenORB, ORBacus, Orbix and VisiBroker, but can be extended to test any ORB
